text: Fumiko Ezaki (江崎 史子; born 27 September 1971) is a Japanese judoka. She won the silver medal at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the extra-light event. At the World Judo Championships she won the silver medal in 1986, 1987 and 1989. At the 1990 Asian Games she became champion in the -48 kg category. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Japanese judoka Category:Living people
title: Fumiko Ezaki
